name: Internal Network Pentest
description: Standard Internal Network Penetration Testing Deliverables

deliverables.title: Network Discovery & Mapping
deliverables.description: Identify live hosts, subnets, and network topology
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: Service Enumeration
deliverables.description: Enumerate services, versions, and potential attack surface
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services

deliverables.title: Active Directory Enumeration
deliverables.description: Enumerate AD users, groups, trusts, and policies
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%Active Directory%' OR title LIKE '%LDAP%'

deliverables.title: SMB/NetBIOS Enumeration
deliverables.description: Enumerate SMB shares, null sessions, and NetBIOS information
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services WHERE port IN (139, 445)

deliverables.title: Credential Harvesting
deliverables.description: Capture and crack credentials through various techniques
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM credentials

deliverables.title: Vulnerability Exploitation
deliverables.description: Exploit identified vulnerabilities to gain initial access
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity = 'critical'

deliverables.title: Lateral Movement
deliverables.description: Move laterally through the network to reach high-value targets

deliverables.title: Domain Compromise Assessment
deliverables.description: Assess path to domain admin or equivalent privileges
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM credentials WHERE username LIKE '%admin%'
